text: :For the television actor, see Yevgeni Gerasimov (actor) Yevgeni Viktorovich Gerasimov (; born 27 March 1968 in Legnica) is a Russian football coach and a former player. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:People from Legnica Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Zenit Saint Petersburg players Category:FC Dynamo Saint Petersburg players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Fakel Voronezh players Category:FC Metallurg Lipetsk players Category:FC Petrotrest players Category:Russian football managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Yevgeni Gerasimov
